content.introduction:
The check diagnoses any 
static_assert
 declaration with an
empty string literal and provides a fix-it note to replace the
declaration with a single-argument 
static_assert
 declaration.

The check is only applicable for C++17 and later code.

The following code:

void
 
f_textless
(
int
 
a
)
 
{


  
static_assert
(
sizeof
(
a
)
 
<=
 
10
,
 
""
);


}

is replaced by:

void
 
f_textless
(
int
 
a
)
 
{


  
static_assert
(
sizeof
(
a
)
 
<=
 
10
);


}
